name: Forest Gnome
description: Forest gnomes have a natural knack for illusion and stealth. They live in hidden communities in sylvan forests, using their magic and affinity for small animals to conceal themselves from threats.

traits.name: Speed
traits.description: Your base walking speed is 25 feet.

traits.name: Darkvision
traits.description: You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light.

traits.name: Gnome Cunning
traits.description: You have advantage on all Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma saving throws against magic.

traits.name: Natural Illusionist
traits.description: You know the Minor Illusion cantrip. Intelligence is your spellcasting ability for it.

traits.name: Speak with Small Beasts
traits.description: Through sounds and gestures, you can communicate simple ideas with Small or smaller beasts.
